#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;
const int N = 1e3 + 5;


int l;
long long k;
string s;

int main(){
//    freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t--){
        cin >> s;
        scanf("%lld", &k);
        string kk = "";
        while (k){
            kk = char(k % 2 + '0') + kk;
            k /= 2;
        }

        reverse(kk.begin(), kk.end());
        reverse(s.begin(), s.end());

        if (kk.size() < s.size()) swap(s, kk);
        string ans = "";
        int rem = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); ++i){
            int v = rem + s[i] + kk[i] - 2 * '0';
            ans = char(v % 2 + '0') + ans;
            rem = v / 2;
        }
        for (int i = s.size(); i < kk.size(); ++i){
            int v = rem + kk[i] - '0';
            ans = char(v % 2 + '0') + ans;
            rem = v / 2;
        }
        while (rem){
            ans = char(rem % 2 + '0') + ans;
            rem /= 2;
        }
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
}
